summary.span: 的派生类，它是所有活动验证程序组件的基类。

span.span: Derivative of that is a base class for all activity validator components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个用于自定义活动的完整的 。The following example shows a complete used for a custom activity. 自定义活动是一个 `ConsoleWriteLineActivity` 活动，它有一个类型为 `Msg` 的依赖项属性，其名称为 。The custom activity is a `ConsoleWriteLineActivity` activity that has a single dependency property named `Msg` of type . 验证程序可以确保设置了 `Msg` 属性。The validator ensures that the `Msg` property is set. 如果未设置，则在对 调用 方法时，编译器将显示错误，且编译将失败。If it is not set, the compiler displays an error when the method is called on the and the compilation fails. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用 以验证 的属性。This method calls to validate the properties of the . 如果 不是根 ，则此方法只验证 的 的唯一性。This method only validates the uniqueness of the for the if the is not a root . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写用于自定义活动的 的 方法，该自定义活动有一个类型为 `Msg` 的依赖项属性，其名称为 。The following example shows how to override the method for an used for a custom activity that has a single dependency property named `Msg` of type . 自定义验证程序可以确保设置了 `Msg` 属性。The custom validator ensures that the `Msg` property is set. 如果未设置，则在对 调用 方法时，编译器将显示错误，且编译将失败。If it is not set, the compiler displays an error when the method is called on the and the compilation fails.
